item.title: Setup VLAN routing on Linux
item.description: What is the purpose of this writing? As for the 25 April 2021, I was in the process of learning networking for the DevOps Engineer position in my current company at Namecheap and I’ve received the task to understand networking. The task was about creating a network configuration where one Linux machine is acting as a router and a few others are like clients that can communicate with each other(depends on the topology) or go to the Internet only via that router.
